sentences.sContent: As well as this, the movie is an intriguing, if slightly loaded new perspective on the abdication crisis of 1936.

sentences.sContent: But even after his abdication, he remained the effective ruler of China until his death four years later at the age of 88.

sentences.sCn: 即使在退位后，他仍然手握大权，直到四年后以88岁的高龄去世，一代王朝才正式落下帷幕。
